    • Uses of OfferedI in fr.upmc.components.connectors

      Subinterfaces of OfferedI in fr.upmc.components.connectors 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataTwoWayConnectorI
      The interface DataTwoWayConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between requiring and offering components that exchange data rather than calling services from each others, but using the same interface on both sides and act as peers in the exchange.
      interface  TwoWayConnectorI
      The interface TwoWayConnectorI is the generic interface for connectors that mediate between components exposing two-way interfaces.
      Classes in fr.upmc.components.connectors that implement OfferedI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDataTwoWayConnector
      The class AbstractDataTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic data connector between components exchanging data in a peer to peer way rather than calling each others services.
      class  AbstractTwoWayConnector
      The class AbstractTwoWayConnector partially implements a basic connector between components calling each others services in a peer to peer way rather than in a client-provider relationship.
      class  DataTwoWayConnector
      The class DataTwoWayConnector implements a standard connector for components exchanging data in a peer-to-peer mode using standard data two-way interfaces.
      Fields in fr.upmc.components.connectors declared as OfferedI 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected OfferedI AbstractConnector.offering
      port of the component providing the service.
      Methods in fr.upmc.components.connectors with parameters of type OfferedI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void ConnectorI.connect(OfferedI offering, RequiredI requiring)
      connect a requiring component to a requiring one.
      void AbstractTwoWayConnector.connect(OfferedI peer1, RequiredI peer2)

    • Uses of OfferedI in fr.upmc.components.cvm

      Methods in fr.upmc.components.cvm with parameters of type OfferedI 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void AbstractDistributedCVM.publishPort(OfferedI port)
      publish inbound ports (data inbound ports and two way ports) both locally and globally, which includes the RMI registry and the global component registry; outbound ports need not be published globally but only locally (this information is used by the connection builder to decide how the connections to that port must be done).
      static void AbstractDistributedCVM.unpublishPort(OfferedI port)
      unpublish previously published inbound ports (data inbound ports and two way ports) both locally and globally, which includes the RMI registry and the global component registry; outbound ports need not be published globally but only locally.

      interface  URIProviderI
      The interface URIProviderI defines the interface offered by a an URI provider component.

    • Uses of OfferedI in fr.upmc.components.interfaces

      Subinterfaces of OfferedI in fr.upmc.components.interfaces 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataOfferedI
      The interface DataOfferedI defines a basic interface for components that exchange raw data rather than calling each others services.
      static interface  DataOfferedI.PullI
      The interface DataOfferedI.PullI contains the signatures of the methods that can be called by the requiring components to get data from the offering component.
      static interface  DataRequiredI.PushI
      The interface DataRequiredI.PushI contains the signatures of the methods that are called by the offering component to send data to the requiring component.
      interface  DataTwoWayI
      The interface TwoWayDataI enables two components to exchange data in a peer-to-peer way, that is the two components implement the same interface and have both the sender and receiver roles.
      static interface  DataTwoWayI.PullI
      The interface TwoWayDataI.PullI contains the signature of the method that is called by one component to get data from the other component.
      static interface  DataTwoWayI.PushI
      The interface TwoWayDataI.PushI contains the signature of the method that is called by one component to send data to the other component.
      interface  TwoWayI
      The interface TwoWayI is meant to represent symmetric interfaces connecting two components that can play both the role of clients and server towards each others.

    • Uses of OfferedI in fr.upmc.components.ports

      Subinterfaces of OfferedI in fr.upmc.components.ports 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DataInboundPortI
      The interface DataInboundPortI represents the category of ports used by components exchanging data rather than being called for their services.
      interface  DataOutboundPortI
      The interface DataOutboundPortI represents the category of ports used by components exchanging data rather than calling providers for their services.
      interface  DataTwoWayPortI
      The interface DataTwoWayPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for exchanging data among components that act both as clients and service providers towards each others on the same interface.
      interface  InboundPortI
      The interface InboundPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for incoming calls from client components towards the service providers.
      interface  TwoWayPortI
      The interface TwoWayPortI represents the category of PortI that cater for incoming and outgoing calls among components that act both as clients and service providers towards each others on the same interface.
      Classes in fr.upmc.components.ports that implement OfferedI 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDataInboundPort
      The class AbstractDataInboundPort partially implements an inbound port for data exchanging components.
      class  AbstractDataInboundPortForPlugin
      The class AbstractDataInboundPortForPlugin extends the standard data inbound port for the case where the pull services to be called is implemented by a plug-in.
      class  AbstractDataOutboundPort
      The class AbstractDataOutboundPort partially implements an outbound port for data exchanging components.
      class  AbstractDataOutboundPortForPlugin
      The class AbstractDataOutboundPortForPlugin extends the standard data outbound port for the case where the push services to be called is implemented by a plug-in.
      class  AbstractDataTwoWayPort
      The class AbstractDataTwoWayPort partially implements a data two-way port for components exchanging data with each others in a peer-to-peer fashion.
      class  AbstractInboundPort
      The class AbstractInboundPort partially implements an inbound port which implements the offered interface of the provider component so that the provider can be called through this port.
      class  AbstractInboundPortForPlugin
      The class AbstractInboundPortForPlugin extends the standard inbound port for the case where the services to be called is implemented by a plug-in.
      class  AbstractTwoWayPort
      The class AbstractTwoWayPort partially implements a two-way port for components calling each others in a peer-to-peer fashion.
